objectFlagDescription: The sobject(s) that you wish to import data for.
dataDirFlagDescription: The path where the data resides.
removeFlagDescription: Delete the record(s) from the target within the specified directory.
allowPartialFlagDescription: Allows the operation to continue when a failure occurs.
importHandlerFlagDescription: Allows specification of the import handler to use - will look in the internal registry first and then looks to load a module if the file exists
